translations.english: He displayed the head of the former King Sai Xin in Queyang marketplace.
He stayed four days, then returned to the army, encamping at Guangwu.

translations.chinese: 關中兵益出，而彭越、田橫居梁地，往來苦楚兵，絕其糧食。
translations.english: Guanzhong troops came out in greater numbers, while Peng Yue and Tian Heng occupied Liang territory, going back and forth to harass Chu troops and cut off their grain supplies.

translations.chinese: 韓信已破齊，使人言曰：「齊邊楚，權輕，不為假王，恐不能安齊。」
translations.english: Han Xin had already broken Qi and sent someone to say: "Qi borders Chu. My authority is light. If not made a puppet king, I fear I cannot pacify Qi."
King Han was angry and wanted to attack him.
